text.text:
Disappointed by the Misleading Standards and Unprofessional Conduct

I had a very disappointing experience at Recedency Club, Pune — a property that falsely projects itself as a premium establishment charging five-star rates, but fails miserably when it comes to basic hygiene and customer service.

During my earlier stay, I encountered bed bugs in the room, which was both shocking and unacceptable for a place that charges such high prices. I shared my honest review online, only to be personally requested by Ms. Carol at the reception to remove it, with the assurance that pest control measures would be taken immediately and such issues would not happen again. Believing in their word and commitment to improvement, I took down the review in good faith.

However, on my recent trip to Pune, I reached out to Ms. Carol again to rebook the same room, hoping to see improvements firsthand. To my surprise, I was met with a completely unprofessional and dismissive attitude. They showed no courtesy, no intention to address my concerns, and no willingness to even speak professionally. Clearly, once the review was gone, so was their accountability.

This kind of behavior is not only unethical but also speaks volumes about how little they value guest safety, trust, and basic human dignity. Adding to my concern, this property is associated with the same family involved in last year’s tragic Porsche accident that resulted in the loss of innocent lives — a fact that adds an unsettling context to how little regard they seem to have for people’s wellbeing, both within and outside their premises.

I am writing this review again not out of frustration, but to warn future guests to think twice before trusting the “premium” claims made by Recedency Club Pune. Cleanliness, professionalism, and guest care should never be compromised — especially not when you’re charging five-star rates.

text.text:
Red flag - Disappointing Stay – Unhelpful Staff and overall not recommended.

Terrible Experience – Avoid This Place

We booked 5 rooms, and due to an emergency, one room had to check out a day early. Despite informing the staff, we were still charged for the full stay. When we tried to resolve the issue, the staff were rude, unhelpful, and kept blaming Booking.com instead of taking any responsibility. Their attitude was completely unprofessional and dismissive. The manager had no courtesy to respond to the request rather they vanished post our discussion because their duty hours ended.

The property itself is not very well maintained. Rooms have no ceiling fans—only ACs, making it either freezing or stuffy.. For a hotel, this is ridiculous.

To top it off, they charged our credit cards without any prior notice or approval. That’s a huge red flag and completely unacceptable.

Breakfast was okay, but even that couldn’t make up for the overall experience. The watchman becomes the receptionist in the morning, which says a lot about how this place is run.

I would absolutely not recommend this hotel. Shady billing practices, and zero accountability. Stay away.

text.text: My recent visit to Portico Restaurant at Sayaji Hotel was a delight! The culinary experience was exceptional, with every dish being perfectly prepared and incredibly flavorful. I was particularly impressed by the elegant decor and the beautiful ambiance, which created a wonderful dining atmosphere. What truly stood out was their impeccable hospitality and the attentive, helpful staff. A big thank you to Ankita for her outstanding service.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of celebrating a special birthday with a cake crafted by Chef Sarita at Sayaji Hotel, and it was truly a memorable experience. The cake was not only visually stunning but also absolutely delicious. Every detail, from the intricate decorations to the perfectly balanced flavors, reflected Chef Sarita’s exceptional skill and passion for baking.

The sponge was light, moist, and fresh, while the frosting was rich without being overly sweet — a perfect harmony that everyone at the party raved about. You could tell that only the finest ingredients were used, and the personalized touches made the celebration even more special.

Chef Sarita’s professionalism and creativity truly made the birthday unforgettable. I would highly recommend her cakes for any special occasion – they are a masterpiece in both taste and presentation!

Thank you, Chef Sarita and Sayaji Hotel, for making the day so special.

text.text:
Had a comfortable 5D/4N stay at Fairfield by Marriott, Pune Kharadi. The room was clean, well-maintained, and equipped with all essentials—TV with plenty of channels, water kettle, hair dryer, and iron. The beddings were neat, the bathroom spotless with toiletries provided, and housekeeping ensured fresh towels and daily cleaning.

Breakfast was a big plus with a good mix of options to choose from. The front desk staff was polite and helpful, especially the lady on the night shift, who made the stay even smoother.

Overall, a pleasant and hassle-free stay with reliable Marriott standards.

text.text:
Green Park Bangalore: A Promising Stay with Room for Culinary Growth

My recent stay at the Green Park Hotel in Bangalore was largely excellent. The hotel boasts a great location near Vega City Mall, making it super convenient. Rooms are spacious and clean, and the staff is incredibly courteous and helpful, truly enhancing the experience.

However, while the food was generally good and the breakfast spread decent, the dining options could significantly improve in variety and choice. Having experienced the truly "impactful" and diverse menus at Green Park hotels in Chennai and Hyderabad, I found Bangalore's offerings less inspiring. Those sister properties offered a broader range of regional and international cuisines, with a distinct culinary adventure.

To match its otherwise strong hospitality and amenities, Green Park Bangalore should consider expanding its menu to offer more diverse, memorable dishes. This would elevate an already good stay into an outstanding one.

text.text:
I stayed at Oakwood Residence in Pune and while the location is very good, the rooms definitely need an update. The biggest disappointment was at breakfast. There was no system to record guest names, which caused confusion and unnecessary waiting. When I pointed this out, instead of fixing the issue, the manager got defensive and actually told me “don’t say anything about management it’s good .” “Who does that” ?

This response was completely unacceptable. As a guest, I have every right to share feedback, especially when it concerns fairness and basic service. What if someone else had simply walked ahead of us because there was no record? The lack of accountability and the dismissive attitude from the manager left a very poor impression. A property like this has potential, but experiences like these make it very disappointing.

text.text:
Avoid This Place! Feels Abandoned and Unsafe

I had an extremely disappointing stay at this hotel. The entire place feels shady and poorly maintained. Many rooms look abandoned, giving off a creepy, horror-like atmosphere. The bathrooms are in terrible condition, with peeling paint and broken fixtures.

Security is a major concern—there’s no proper lock on the restroom, and even worse, you can’t fully lock your room from the inside! Anyone with a key can enter at any time, which is unsettling. The receptionist was unfriendly and unhelpful, adding to the bad experience.

Overall, this hotel is poorly maintained, unsafe, and provides terrible service. Definitely not worth staying here!

text.text:
Hotel Review:
My recent stay at was quite disappointing. Despite staying in an Executive Room, the experience was far from satisfactory.
•	Insects at Night: I noticed insects in the room during the night, and surprisingly, there was no All Out or any insect repellent provided.
•	Lack of Amenities: For an Executive Room, I expected basic facilities like a smart TV, but it wasn’t available. Additionally, essential items like toothpaste, a comb, and even bathroom slippers were missing.
•	Average Cleanliness: The room’s cleanliness was just average—not what you would expect for the price and the category of the room.

Overall, the hotel did not meet the expected standards for comfort and amenities. I hope management addresses these issues for a better guest experience.

text.text:
Had a great stay at The Fern Residency Woodland, Pune with my family! 🏨 The location is super convenient – close to the railway station and near the IT sector.

The hotel is clean, well-maintained, and has a fresh, modern vibe since it's been renovated from the old Woodland Hotel. We stayed in the Fern Club Room, which was spacious and comfortable with a king-size bed, couch, and work desk.

Plenty of parking space if you’re driving down. The staff was polite, and service was quick. There’s a pure veg restaurant in-house, and in-room dining is also available – both were good.

Overall, a solid choice for both business and family stays. 👍

I had a lovely stay at **The Fern Residency Woodland Pune**. The property is peaceful and surrounded by greenery, which gives it a very relaxing vibe in the heart of the city. The staff was courteous and helpful throughout my stay.

Rooms were clean, well-maintained, and quite spacious. I especially liked the eco-friendly concept they follow. The in-house restaurant served tasty food, although the menu could use a few more options.

A great choice if you're looking for a calm, comfortable stay in Pune. Would definitely recommend!

text.text:
The hotel is very close to Bund Garden Metro Station. It’s an old property but comfortable. Rooms and bathrooms are clean. The AC works well, and the service is good.

The only issue was Wi-Fi—it stopped working during a thunderstorm. Also, there’s no physical latch on the door, only a key lock, which might be a concern for solo female travelers.

That said, the area felt safe, and the staff was friendly. As a solo female traveler, I felt safe staying here.

This place is located just next to metro station, so is well connected to railway station and main market in Pune. But the locality is very congested and dirty. There is no good eating joint nearby, however, the hotels restaurant is good and provides simple Indian food. The rooms are ok but bathrooms do not have hot water throughout. Overall experience was just satisfactory.

text.text:
INFESTED WITH BED BUGS AND COCKROACHES

First of all they will ask you to pay everything in advance as if they deserve the money.

Secondly the rooms although do-able seems nice at first but then at night u will see endless amount of cockroaches roaming around your bed and the table.

We were three students who came for a workshop in iiser, got fooled by the pictures. It's in a shady building as well.

The receptionist looks clueless all the time and even though the workers there are good and friendly but even they can't help the room's state.

The toilets have all kinds of cockroaches as well.

Not only that but bed bugs and Ticks who pierce through ur body are also found in their bed. The mattress looks extremely dirty - lipstick marks, god knows what filth other than that is present on those.

Even the breakfast had plates with water on it and the food was survivable.

If I could give half a star I would.

text.text:
We had a wedding function and reception at Hotel President and our experience was wonderful! I want to extend my heartfelt thanks to Mr. Nitin Sathe for his excellent coordination, which made everything run smoothly, along with his dedicated team.
Family and guests truly enjoyed the ambience and the food, and all had a wonderful time. The food they served was fantastic!
The staff was very attentive to our immediate needs and requirements, ensuring that everything went well.
I highly recommend Hotel President for any family functions. They offer a wide range of options and everything needed for events, including weddings, and they work with you to ensure that everything goes off without any issues. Thanks once again!

text.text: Stayed at The President Hotel for a short layover. While the location is convenient and the pricing is budget-friendly, the overall experience was below expectations. The bathroom door didn’t shut properly, and basic amenities like water, towels, and soap were missing. It’s suitable only if you’re looking for a low-cost, no-frills stopover, but don’t expect much beyond that.

The entire hotel ambience was peaceful and luxurious. A heartfelt thank you to the housekeeping team and the entire hotel staff.

The rooms are neat and the service is top notch! It has a touch of the old world vintage though you don't get a good view of the place from your room it's not necessary.

The place itself can be explored for a few days, with their ducks walking around and a playroom for kids. Truly deserves a  5 star!

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Royal Orchid Golden Suite and I must say, it far exceeded my expectations in every way. From the moment I stepped foot into the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles and exceptional service. Allow me to share some highlights from my stay.

First and foremost, the hotel's location is superb. Situated in a prime location, it offers convenient access to the city's attractions, shopping centers, and restaurants. Whether you're a business traveler or a tourist, the hotel's central location is an ideal base for exploring the vibrant city.

The spaciousness and elegance of the Royal Orchid Golden Suite truly impressed me. The room I stayed in was beautifully decorated and well-appointed with modern amenities. The attention to detail in design and comfort was evident. The bed was luxuriously comfortable, providing me with a restful night's sleep after a long day of exploring. The suite also featured a separate living area, which was perfect for relaxing or catching up on work.

The impeccable service provided by the hotel staff deserves special mention. They went above and beyond to ensure my stay was as pleasant as possible. From the swift check-in process to the thoughtful recommendations for local dining options, the staff's professionalism and attentiveness were truly commendable. Any requests or inquiries I had were promptly addressed, creating a seamless and stress-free experience.

The hotel facilities were top-notch. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my workout routine during my stay. Additionally, the rooftop pool offered a serene oasis amidst the bustling city. I enjoyed lounging by the poolside, soaking in the stunning views and sipping on refreshing cocktails from the poolside bar.

Lastly, the dining experience at the Royal Orchid Golden Suite was extraordinary. The breakfast buffet featured an extensive selection of both local and international cuisine, catering to all tastes. The quality and freshness of the food were exceptional, and the attentive service from the dining staff truly made each meal a memorable experience.

In conclusion, my stay at the Royal Orchid Golden Suite was nothing short of exceptional. The staff's impeccable service, luxurious accommodations, convenient location, and remarkable dining options truly elevated my experience. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area. I'm already eagerly looking forward to my next visit to the Royal Orchid Golden Suite.

text.text:
Royal Orchid Golden Suites offer executive and deluxe suites.

I stayed in their deluxe suite room which was massive. My master bedroom had a comfy bed, tv , neat and bathrooms and my living room was well spaced out with a huge sofa, a dining table, study desk, tv, snack basket, fully operational kitchen & a big balcony with two chairs.

Their multi cuisine restaurant Kasba serves delicious Ala carte and buffet spread.

They offer ample options for both veg and non vegetarians.

They have a separate section for healthy food during buffet which shouldn’t be missed.

You can burn those extra calories in their gym which is very well equipped.

They have multiple board rooms and banquet halls which are immensely popular for private functions and board meets.

Staff was polite, attentive & provided impeccable customer service 😊

They have a couple of indoor door games and ample parking which was helpful.

Had a delightful experience @ royal orchid golden suites in pune

text.text:
I recently stayed at Ginger Hotel Pune Wakad and was impressed with my overall experience. The hotel's location is convenient as it is situated near to various IT companies, and it is easily accessible from the Mumbai-Pune expressway. The hotel's lobby area was modern and well-maintained, and the staff was friendly and welcoming.

My room was spacious, clean, and comfortable, with all the necessary amenities like a comfortable bed, air conditioning, a television, and a clean bathroom with hot water. The room also had a small seating area, which was perfect for me to work on my laptop.

The hotel has an in-house restaurant that serves a variety of delicious dishes. The breakfast buffet was particularly impressive, with a wide range of options to choose from, both vegetarian and non-vegetarian.

Overall, I had a great stay at Ginger Hotel Pune Wakad, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay in Pune

text.text:
A Prime Location Gem - Ginger Pune Wakad!

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Ginger Pune Wakad, and I must say it exceeded all my expectations. This hotel, located at a prime location on the National Highway, offers a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and exceptional service.
From the moment I arrived, the staff at Ginger Pune Wakad made me feel welcomed and valued. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and the staff provided warm and friendly hospitality throughout my stay. Their professionalism and attentiveness added to the overall positive experience.
The location of the hotel on the National Highway is a definite advantage. It offers easy accessibility to major attractions, shopping centers, and transportation hubs. Whether I was exploring the city or attending business meetings, everything was conveniently within reach, making my stay both efficient and enjoyable.
The rooms at Ginger Pune Wakad were comfortable and well-equipped. The bedding was cozy, and the amenities provided catered to all my needs. The cleanliness and attention to detail were impressive, ensuring a pleasant and hassle-free stay. Additionally, the hotel's quiet ambiance allowed for a restful night's sleep.
One of the standout features of this hotel is the exceptional service provided by the staff. They were friendly, proactive, and always ready to assist with any requests or inquiries. From arranging transportation to providing local recommendations, their genuine care for guests' satisfaction was evident throughout my stay.
Ginger Pune Wakad also offers excellent dining options. The on-site restaurant served a variety of delicious and well-prepared dishes. The quality of the food was impressive, and the attentive staff ensured a memorable dining experience. The restaurant's ambiance was inviting, and the menu provided a range of choices to suit different preferences.
In terms of value for money, Ginger Pune Wakad offers an excellent balance. The pricing is reasonable, considering the quality of the services, amenities, and the prime location. The hotel's commitment to providing a comfortable and enjoyable stay makes it a worthwhile investment.
In conclusion, I highly recommend Ginger Pune Wakad to anyone seeking a comfortable and convenient stay in Pune. The prime location, comfortable rooms, exceptional service, and delightful dining options make it a top-notch choice. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, Ginger Pune Wakad provides a memorable and enjoyable experience. Five stars all the way!

text.text:
Update : 29-30 April 2023.

Ginger has now collaborated with Nue alongside Tata. Hope I got the name right.

Rooms are bigger now and the restaurant has slightly changed too. Thankfully, they still serve Lavazza 😄.

Good service by Joydeep and Puja.

The stay is allright, I wish the rooms could be a bit bigger but it’s clean and comfy none the less. The staff is polite and always ready to help even late at night. I really like the fact that the parking is well spaced so car doors don’t touch/ scratch into each other and they have a DC electric charger for Electric Vehicles.

The food is fabulous, their in-house restaurant belongs to a hotel 2 categories above this. It’s not often that one will find authentic Dilli-wala butter chicken and Hyderabadi style kachhi akhni ki biryani in hotels, and Chef Deepankar has nailed it! Breakfast fare is decent and tasty. The restaurant staff including Nalu and Manoj are very helpful - I mentioned the kind of food I like and they made excellent suggestions for food.

For all the coffee lovers out there- this place serves Lavazza! Great Coffee!

The reception staff including Priya and Sejal are helpful. My check in process was quick.

Overall, I feel that the hotel rooms could be slightly better designed, but for this price and the helpful, polite and accommodating nature of everyone, and that fantastic restaurant - this place is worth your money and worthy of a 5 star review.

I really like the fact that the parking is well spaced so car doors don’t touch/ scratch into each other and they have a DC electric charger for Electric Vehicles.

The food is fabulous, their in-house restaurant belongs to a hotel 2 categories above this. It’s not often that one will find authentic Dilli-wala butter chicken and Hyderabadi style kachhi akhni ki biryani in hotels, and Chef Deepankar has nailed it! Breakfast fare is decent and tasty. The restaurant staff including Nalu and Manoj are very helpful - I mentioned the kind of food I like and they made excellent suggestions for food.

For all the coffee lovers out there- this place serves Lavazza! Great Coffee!

The reception staff including Priya and Sejal are helpful. My check in process was quick.

Overall, I feel that the hotel rooms could be slightly better designed, but for this price and the helpful, polite and accommodating nature of everyone, and that fantastic restaurant - this place is worth your money and worthy of a 5 star review.

text.text:
My recent stay at Hotel Ginger was a pleasant experience. The hotel's modern and minimalist design created a welcoming atmosphere. The rooms were clean, well-maintained, and equipped with all the necessary amenities. The location was convenient, with easy access to major attractions and transportation options.

One aspect that truly stood out was the exceptional service provided by the housekeeping staff. Rita , in particular, went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. His attention to detail and friendly demeanor made our stay even more enjoyable. He was always willing to assist with any requests and made sure our room was spotless at all times.

Overall, I would highly recommend Hotel Ginger for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The combination of modern amenities, convenient location, and excellent service from staff like Asikur Rehman made it a memorable experience.

text.text: If you're looking for a good business hotel in the Aundh Baner area of Pune, look no further than the Green Park. We frequently host conferences and meetings here, and our out of town colleagues are put up here. I love the food, and the wine list is great too at the restaurant. The staff are professional and well trained - the hotel section features spacious rooms, many with pool facing views - and there is a lot of room for a walk or stroll around the grounds. You'll love the duck family that walks around the open spaces! The standout feature of the hotel is its location on the main road, yet tucked away with a large parking area up front. The beds are very comfortable, and the rooms are modern and have undergone a recent fitout. The prices are reasonable for most business travellers, and the Green Park does offer corporate deals (I know, we have a good deal with them which includes preferential room rates as well as discounts on food and beverages). The front desk concierge is very helpful and are happy to organize items at short notice, such as a projector for a meeting or a car service for an across-town trip. If you're looking for a quiet, efficient, understated hotel with an excellent bar and restaurant where you can also conduct your meetings, with lots of spaces inside and outside - then this is the place for you.

text.text:
I visited Hotel Green Park for dinner last night. It took me back in time with its charming old school vibe that, if you've been to Otters Club or Khar Gymkhana in Mumbai, you will love too.
Their top notch service too is reminiscent of old school top quality hotels where the wait staff will promptly fill your glass of water if they see it empty!
The food and beverage were really good and with every first bite or first sip I said, "oh yes, they get it!" And they do! Everything regarding our meal experience was the way it used to be in top notch hotels and I daresay Green Park gave me a little bit of my childhood last night, an experience I will never forget!

Thank you ❤️

text.text:
Oakwood Residency: A Masterclass in Hospitality

Staying at Oakwood Residency was nothing short of extraordinary. Every aspect of my experience left me in awe, redefining what exceptional service truly means.

Culinary Excellence Beyond Compare:
The paneer served here is simply life-changing—the best I’ve ever had. The chefs have set a new gold standard, earning a permanent place at the top of my taste chart. I never thought food could be this memorable.

Thoughtful and Compassionate Staff:
The staff here truly understand the needs of their guests. Many visitors, like me, are individuals who may feel lonely at times, and their warm, genuine greetings made all the difference. It’s a gesture I’ve never seen complimented elsewhere but one I’ll forever cherish.

Immaculate Room Service:
Their attention to detail is astonishing. To test their professionalism, I rearranged cutlery and even changed the bedsheet orientation. By the next day, everything was back to perfection. My in-room slippers were even replaced without a word—a testament to their dedication and silent efficiency.

Lightning-Fast Services:
Every service request I made was fulfilled in a mere 8-9 seconds, thanks to their strategically assigned, floor-specific workforce. It was like clockwork—seamless and impressive.

Punctual and Patient Driver:
On the very first day, I lost my luggage at the airport. The driver didn’t just wait patiently but went out of his way to assist me in every possible way. Even during my daily office commute, he would always be on time and never once complained when I was late. His kindness and professionalism deserve special recognition.

Oakwood Residency doesn’t just provide a place to stay; it offers a holistic experience of care, precision, and excellence. My heartfelt thanks to the entire team for making my stay unforgettable in every way.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Marriott Suites Pune and it was a truly delightful experience.

The suites themselves were spacious and very comfortable, making it easy to relax after a long day.

Overall, provided an outstanding experience with its friendly staff, comfortable accommodations, and excellent food. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a warm, welcoming, and comfortable stay in Pune.

text.text:
recently had the pleasure of staying at Marriott suites Pune and I must say, it was an absolutely incredible experience. From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the level of luxury and attention to detail that this hotel offers.

The rooms were spacious and beautifully appointed, with all the amenities you could possibly need for a comfortable stay. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the linens were of the highest quality. The bathroom was also impressive, with a large soaking tub and a separate shower with excellent water pressure.

But what really sets this hotel apart is the level of service. The staff was friendly, attentive, and always willing to go above and beyond to ensure that my stay was enjoyable. From the front desk to the housekeeping staff, everyone was incredibly professional and accommodating.

text.text:
Located very close to the passport office. Well connected to Koregaon Park and Kalyani Nagar, where you can party. Airport is not very far as well, depending on traffic. The hotel is located in a quiet surrounding. Check in was smooth. No hassels. Bags are scanned at check in. Wheelchair accessible hotel. Safe and secure. One can get cabs and ricks easily in case you wish to commute.  There are multiple room options.  We stayed in a 2bhk. So the rooms were well equipped. Had a feeling of being at home. Kitchen with utensils, microwave, toaster,  pans and a refrigerator. To make sure you can cook if you feel like. Rooms were comfortable. Spacious wardrobe.  An in room safe. Washing machine. A well equipped room. 2bhk had a TV in the hall and in both the bedrooms. Balconies were nice with a chair and table for a sit out. Bathrooms well cleaned. I loved the bathtub. Coming to the room service. On time. The restaurant Senses is where we had our buffet breakfast, which is open till 11am. Sous Chef Karan Gaikwad, thank you for the nice variety of breakfast. PC for always welcoming us at the restaurant with a beautiful smile. Housekeeping staff have been very prompt in cleaning our room. Special mention Pallvi, Rohit and Sukhanandan. The hotel also has a spa to relax after a tiring day. The swimming pool is right next to the restaurant. So u can have a peaceful view while eating. There a small play area for kids. My mom and uncle needed wheelchairs. I need to mention Laxman and Trivesh (valet) for the effort of getting them from the room to the restaurant.
A big thanks to all who made our stay comfortable and made sure we had a good stay.
Overall Location 4.5/5
Ambience 5/5
Food 4.5/5
Service 4/5
Staff 5/5

text.text:
Best hotel in Koregaon. Centrally connected with BUND garden metro line 2 min walk. Station is 15 min and airport is 30 min.

Likes -
Best priced hotel. Room very spacious, lift functional (5 floor) , window AC available, tea kettle available, hot water available and surrounding is full of natural green space with beautiful chirping of birds. Very cooperative hotel staff. Timely supply of hotel amenities.

Miss - No restaurant in hotel so all orders are thru swiggy, zomato or hop into nearby restaurants. Plenty of classy food available.

text.text:
The President Hotel is an excellent choice for travellers visiting Pune, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Pune, The President Hotel is located a short distance from Laxmi Road (1.2 mi) and Shaniwar Wada (1.3 mi).

Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, a minibar, and a kitchenette, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the small hotel.

The President Hotel features 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a fitness center and an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to The President Hotel, free parking is available.

When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Mi-A-Mi, Area 51, and Barometer, which are some pubs that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.

Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a history museum, such as Shivaji Maharaj Museum of Indian History.

Enjoy your stay in Pune!

text.text:
I recently stayed at Hotel President in Erandwane (Karve Road, Pune), and I’m genuinely pleased with the overall experience. From the moment I checked in, the hospitality and professionalism of the staff stood out. The reception team was welcoming, courteous, and quick with the check-in formalities, which made a great first impression after a long journey.

🏨 Ambience & Cleanliness

The hotel has a simple yet classy ambiance. The lobby and common areas are well-maintained and clean. I stayed in a Deluxe Room, which, although not overly spacious, was very neatly kept. The linens were clean, the bed was comfortable, and the room had all the basic amenities like a mini-fridge, tea/coffee kettle, and free Wi-Fi. The bathroom was also clean with proper toiletries provided. Daily housekeeping was prompt and efficient.

🍽️ Food & Restaurant

The in-house restaurant, Royal Symphony, deserves a special mention. I had breakfast and dinner there during my stay. The breakfast buffet had a good spread — fresh fruits, South Indian dishes, cereals, and tea/coffee. The quality of food was very good — freshly prepared and flavorful. I especially enjoyed their paneer tikka and butter naan during dinner. The restaurant staff was attentive and ensured we were comfortable.

🤵 Service

Service is where Hotel President truly excels. Whether it was room service, restaurant staff, or front desk assistance — everyone was polite and quick to respond. On one occasion, I needed help with printing a few documents, and the front office handled it smoothly without any delay. I also appreciated their willingness to provide early morning tea on request.

📍 Location

The location of this hotel is ideal. It’s in the heart of Pune, just off Karve Road, and very close to important places like Deccan Gymkhana, Fergusson College, and the bustling JM Road. Commuting was easy, and autos/cabs are readily available right outside. There are also many cafes and shops nearby, which added to the convenience.

💰 Value for Money

Given the location, service, and cleanliness, I found the pricing quite reasonable. It's not a luxury hotel, but it offers all the comforts needed for a pleasant business or personal stay. I felt it was good value for money, especially compared to other options in the same area.

---

Final Verdict

If you’re looking for a clean, centrally located, and well-managed hotel in Pune, Hotel President is a great choice. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, you’ll find comfort, safety, and great food here. I would definitely stay again and recommend it to others as well.

⭐ Rating: 4.5/5
